articles.content:
The Crown has already resumed production on its sixth and final series in Barcelona after filming was paused for a single day following the death of Queen Elizabeth II.
Elizabeth Debicki, who is tak… [+10271 chars]

articles.author: Jacob Thorburn, Rachael Bunyan, James Gordon
articles.title: Succession creator Jesse Armstrong blasted online after 'obscene' King Charles comments during Emmys - Daily Mail
articles.description: Jesse Armstrong, 51, the British creator of the HBO hit Succession, faced backlash online after he took an 'obscene' swipe at King Charles III during his acceptance speech at the Emmy Awards last night.
articles.content: Brian Cox appeared keen to steer the British writer and creator of hit HBO television series Succession away from controversy after he cracked a joke about King Charles III just days after Queen Eliz… [+48042 chars]
